org.hibernate.engine.transaction.jta.platform.internal

Interface JtaSynchronizationStrategy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SynchronizationRegistryBasedSynchronizationStrategy, TransactionManagerBasedSynchronizationStrategy

    public interface JtaSynchronizationStrategy
extends Serializable
    Contract used to centralize Synchronization handling logic.
